metadata.title: CVE-2021-3600 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: It was discovered that the eBPF implementation in the Linux kernel did notproperly track bounds information for 32 bit registers when performing divand mod operations. A local attacker could use this to possibly executearbitrary code.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
